divs: Sighting DetailsAt a bit passed 8pm I went out for a walk with my fiance. The skies were clear and we walked together and talked until we arrived to the gym's door area. As I was going to say good bye before my work out I looked up in the sky. I saw immediately many lights at least 5 or 6 moving fast and chasing each other. They were not flying in a straight line and they were not airplanes. I pointed them to my fiance who happens to be an airline pilot and he also saw them. He said, "they must be satellites". I said they can't be satellites, there are too many and they are moving in irregular patterns. After no more than 15 seconds all of the lights vanished. I looked and try to spot them elsewehere in the sky but I didn't see anything else like it. We did see seconds later 2 planes flying from different directions and altitudes but definitely not related nor similar to the lights we saw previously.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Aventura
There were no other sightings in Aventura on or around March 5th 2012
Summary: Strange moving lights in the sky of Miami
